mapper.select: SELECT B.MENU_NO , B.MENU_ORDR , B.MENU_NM , B.UPPER_MENU_NO AS UPPER_MENU_ID , B.MENU_DC , B.RELATE_IMAGE_PATH , B.RELATE_IMAGE_NM , B.PROGRM_FILE_NM , (SELECT C.URL FROM LETTNPROGRMLIST C WHERE B.PROGRM_FILE_NM = C.PROGRM_FILE_NM) AS CHK_URL FROM LETTNMENUCREATDTLS A, LETTNMENUINFO B WHERE B.MENU_NO > 0 AND B.UPPER_MENU_NO = 0 AND A.MENU_NO = B.MENU_NO AND A.AUTHOR_CODE = (SELECT C.AUTHOR_CODE from LETTNEMPLYRSCRTYESTBS C WHERE C.SCRTY_DTRMN_TRGET_ID = #{tmp_UniqId}) ORDER BY MENU_ORDR

SELECT B.MENU_NO , B.MENU_ORDR , B.MENU_NM , B.UPPER_MENU_NO AS UPPER_MENU_ID , B.RELATE_IMAGE_PATH , B.RELATE_IMAGE_NM , (SELECT C.URL FROM LETTNPROGRMLIST C WHERE B.PROGRM_FILE_NM = C.PROGRM_FILE_NM) AS CHK_URL FROM LETTNMENUCREATDTLS A, LETTNMENUINFO B WHERE A.MENU_NO = B.MENU_NO AND A.AUTHOR_CODE = (SELECT AUTHOR_CODE from LETTNEMPLYRSCRTYESTBS WHERE SCRTY_DTRMN_TRGET_ID = #{tmp_UniqId}) ORDER BY B.MENU_ORDR
SELECT URL FROM LETTNPROGRMLIST WHERE PROGRM_FILE_NM = (SELECT PROGRM_FILE_NM FROM LETTNMENUINFO WHERE MENU_NO = #{menuNo})

select MIN(MENU_NO) from LETTNMENUINFO where UPPER_MENU_NO = #{menuNo} and MENU_ORDR = (select MIN(MENU_ORDR) from LETTNMENUCREATDTLS A, LETTNMENUINFO B where A.MENU_NO = B.MENU_NO AND A.AUTHOR_CODE = (SELECT AUTHOR_CODE from LETTNEMPLYRSCRTYESTBS WHERE SCRTY_DTRMN_TRGET_ID = #{tempValue}) AND B.UPPER_MENU_NO = #{menuNo})

select count(MENU_NO) from LETTNMENUINFO where UPPER_MENU_NO = #{menuNo} and MENU_ORDR = (select MIN(MENU_ORDR) from LETTNMENUCREATDTLS A, LETTNMENUINFO B where A.MENU_NO = B.MENU_NO AND A.AUTHOR_CODE = (SELECT AUTHOR_CODE from LETTNEMPLYRSCRTYESTBS WHERE SCRTY_DTRMN_TRGET_ID = #{tempValue}) AND B.UPPER_MENU_NO = #{menuNo})
